title: Predicting diagnostic progression to schizophrenia or bipolar disorder via machine learning applied to electronic health record data
details: L Hansen, M Bernstorff, K Enevoldsen, S Kolding… - medRxiv, 2024
abstract: Importance The diagnosis of schizophrenia and bipolar disorder is often delayed several years despite illness typically emerging in late adolescence or early adulthood, which impedes initiation of targeted treatment. Objective To investigate …
